Ursa Major.Notes: Ursa Major (Latin: "Larger Bear"), a.k.a. the Great Bear, contains Bode's Galaxy (M81 or NGC 3031); Cigar Galaxy (M82 or NGC 3034); Mayall's Object; the Pinwheel Galaxy (M101).
captions: IAU Ursa Major chart, also known as the Great Bear.
